text: Love it. Don't try to say you hate it.
Trolls is honestly a franchise I think gets better with every movie, band together is honestly very solid
It’s just an ok movie

Filme mais ou menos, o roteiro é fraco, as cenas são mais ou menos, a história é fraca, o elenco é fraco, e ninguém ajuda a melhorar o filme, os personagens são fracos, e o filme deveria ter cenas bem melhores e relevantes, para fazer o filme ser bom
Corniest of the series so far
Greatest movie of all time - especially if you grew up in the 90 and have young kids now

Great film, made better by it being the last film I saw with my Moms and the first one she saw with my daughters. There’s just something about shaking your butt to the animated Backstreet Boys that brings joy to the whole family.
While some of the comedy landed, the film just felt like it went in all the wrong directions, and was pretty predictable.
All the music references were great. My son loved it.
The best movie ever. I watched it over 5 times a day

I love Trolls Band Together. Overall this movie is my absolute favourite in the Trolls Franchise. I love the songs the story and introduction of Poppy's sister and Branches Brothers. Overall this movie earns 5 stars 100%
OK Movie,  and That's Actually Great Villain!!
Crap, why would they do something unnecessary. DON’T watch.
It's just okay, nothing great nothing bad just average
It was better than the first 2 movies.
My grandson loved it!
We love this movie for our family! Great humor for the adults to catch but still kid friendly. Soundtrack is a staple in our house!
Please be the last trolls 🙏😭
We want say trolls 3 is the best trolls movie ever
